html:
** Paris-listed shares in world's fourth largest carmaker Stellantis STLA.PA jump 3.5% after it announced a collaboration deal with Amazon AMZN.O

** The two companies said on Wednesday they would collaborate to develop cars and trucks with Amazon software in the dashboards, and deploy electric vans made by Stellantis on Amazon's delivery network (Full Story)

** The stock, which is at its highest in around four months, is the third best performer on France's blue-chip index CAC 40 .FCHI, which rises 0.8%


(Reporting by Dagmarah Mackos)

(( Dagmarah.mackos@thomsonreuters.com ))
